title: BRIEF-State Bank Of India Cuts Interest Rate On Savings Bank Deposits
text:
BRIEF-State Bank Of India Cuts Interest Rate On Savings Bank Deposits

Stock Markets 32 minutes ago (Oct 09, 2019 12:10)

© Reuters. BRIEF-State Bank Of India Cuts Interest Rate On Savings Bank Deposits Oct 9 (Reuters) - State Bank of India : * REVISION IN INTEREST RATE ON SAVINGS BANK DEPOSITS FROM 3.50% TO 3.25% FROM 1ST NOVEMBER 2019 * SBI - SLASHES RETAIL TD AND BULK TD INTEREST RATES BY 10 BPS AND 30 BPS RESPECTIVELY FOR 1 YEAR TO LESS THAN 2 YEARS' TENOR W.E.F. 10TH OCTOBER, 2019

BRIEF-State Bank Of India Cuts Interest Rate On Savings Bank Deposits
description: BRIEF-State Bank Of India Cuts Interest Rate On Savings Bank Deposits
